SEO_DESCRIPTION: Fox Ordering is a simple ordering system for restaurants.

SEO.WHAT_WE_OFFER_DESCRIPTION: Discover the benefits of Fox Ordering and how it can help your restaurant
SEO.SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION: Find answers to your questions and get help with Fox Ordering
SEO.BLOG_DESCRIPTION: Read the latest news and updates from Fox Ordering

HEADER.LOGO: Back to Fox Ordering home page

HERO_SUBTITLE: Increase sales, orders, & maximize profits. Try our personalized ordering system and experience the best direct online ordering service for your restaurant #FoxExperience.
FIRST_BENEFIT: Get more orders with our tools
WHY_FOX_SUBTITLE: The best direct online ordering service
WHY_FOX_1_TEXT: We’re here to help your business grow and maximize profits. Our small convenience fee is 5% over subtotal order value.
WHY_FOX_2_TEXT: There’s no strings attached with us! Enjoy our benefits for as long as you like.
WHY_FOX_3_TEXT: Allow your customers to order directly from your website, browse your menu, and access promotional discounts.
WHY_FOX_4_TEXT: Our system is user-friendly and easy to navigate. We provide training and support to help you get started.
RESTAURANTS_TITLE:
Trusted by
more than 5000 restaurants!
ACCOMPLISHMENTS_TEXT: Embark on a journey to discover the essence of Fox Ordering and its extraordinary accomplishments.
TESTIMONIAL_TEXT: "Felicitamos a Fox Ordering por sus esfuerzos por ayudarnos a incrementar nuestras ventas, estamos muy satisfechos y contentos con su servicio. Gracias"

STEP_ONE_LIST.TWO: Your Restaurant shows up at the top and they click on it.
STEP_ONE_LIST.THREE: They are taken to your website.

STEP_TWO_IMG_ALT: Clients interact with your website GIF

STEP_TWO_LIST.ONE: They’ll be able to place orders directly.

STEP_THREE_LIST.ONE: They’ll browse through your menu and place their order directly.
STEP_THREE_LIST.TWO: You will be notified when an order is placed.
STEP_THREE_LIST.THREE: You will be able to track each order.
STEP_THREE_LIST.FOUR: Order is picked up or delivered with our drivers.

STEP_FOUR_LIST.ONE: We make sure you get paid every single week.
STEP_FOUR_LIST.TWO: Increase orders, reduce fraud, and simplify payment processes with our direct online service.
STEP_FOUR_LIST.THREE: Schedule a free Demo and witness firsthand the success of your restaurant!

OWNER_FORM.TITLE: Are you the owner or manager of the restaurant?
OWNER_FORM.DESCRIPTION: This form allows restaurant owners or managers to sign up for a free demo of our services.

WHAT_WE_OFFER.HERO_SUBTITLE: Your business is our top priority
WHAT_WE_OFFER.HERO_TEXT: We’re here to help your business grow and maximize profits. Our small convenience fee is 5% over the subtotal order value, however this fee can be paid by your customers.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.PERFECT_TECHMATE_TEXT: Increase orders and build customer loyalty with our easy-to-use online ordering service. Watch your profits grow while your customers keep coming back for more.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.PERSONALIZED_WEBSITE_SUBTITLE: Get your exclusive restaurant website for free!
WHAT_WE_OFFER.PERSONALIZED_WEBSITE_TEXT: Let your customers easily browse your menu, enjoy exclusive discounts, and place orders directly, and safely.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CAPITAL_TITLE: Fox Ordering opens the door to easy and hassle-free restaurant funding.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CAPITAL_TEXT: Let your customers easily browse your menu, enjoy exclusive discounts, and place orders directly, and safely.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_TEXT: Find in one place, the restaurants affiliated with our service. Here, customers can order directly from our clients.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_1: Personalized experience: Simple payments, finding locations, or checking an order status has never been easier.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_2: Online presence: Improve the positioning of your restaurant online and reach a growing audience.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_3: Customer Engagement: The power of an app will enhance customer loyalty. Offer this benefit to your customers, whether they use iOS or Android.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FTR_LIST_ITEM_4: Digital Transformation: Develop and evolve your business. The use of technology in your restaurant will always differentiate your service.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.BRANDED_APP_SUBTITLE: Our team will build, optimize, and maintain your branded app, ensuring a seamless experience for both you and your customers.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.BRANDED_APP_TEXT: Let your customers easily browse your menu, enjoy exclusive discounts, and place orders directly, and safely.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FOX_PUSH_TITLE: Elevate customer loyalty with our automated Email and SMS marketing solutions.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.FOX_PUSH_TEXT: Encourage repeat orders, drive sales, and ensure your guests keep returning for more!
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CALL_RELAY_SUBTITLE: Effortlessly manage phone orders and customer inquiries with our call relay service.
WHAT_WE_OFFER.CALL_RELAY_TEXT: With SMS integration, we share your menu and guide them through the easy online ordering process on your website.
